response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your business. Given its exceptional value and quality, I'm offering it to you at a special introductory price of $12,000. This is an opportunity to secure a high-quality asset at a rate that's more favorable than what we might offer to other potential buyers in the future. I look forward to hearing your thoughts on this offer.", "product_price": 12000}
